metadata.title: Membership | Ohana Sun Tanning
metadata.description: Join our exclusive Club Membership and enjoy unlimited tanning, best prices and discounted rates on all our services and products.

props.title: Unlock Your Glow: Join Our Exclusive Membership Today!
props.description: Enjoy unlimited tanning sessions, exclusive discounts, and special member-only events at Ohana Sun Tanning.

marqueeData.text: Join now for radiant skin and unbeatable perks!

props.title: Our Membership Service Offerings

services.name: All Salon Access
services.description: Enjoy exclusive benefits with our All Salon Access Membership, offering unlimited salon services, special discounts for a luxurious and hassle-free beauty exper

services.name: Gold
services.description: This is our level three sunbed. You have an option to lay down or stand up. These beds have a higher level of UVB to activate the tanning process.

services.name: Silver
services.description: These are our level two beds. They are medium size and have separate facial lamps. In a 12-minute session, you will be building your glowing tan.

services.name: Platinum
services.description: Experience our Platinum Level 4 bed, featuring a powerful combination of high-pressure and low-pressure lamps for a deeper, darker, and longer-lasting tan‚Äîplus

services.name: Bronze
services.description: This is our level one sunbed. For a budget-friendly price, you will get 14 minutes maximum and separate facial lamps for a beautiful bronzed tan.

props.description: Explore our Membership options tailored for you.

props.title: Exclusive Membership Benefits Await

features.title: Unlimited Tanning Access
features.description: Enjoy unlimited access to our state-of-the-art tanning beds anytime during operating hours.

features.title: Members-Only Discounts
features.description: Receive exclusive discounts on tanning products and services, maximizing your savings.

features.title: Priority Booking Privileges
features.description: Get priority access to book appointments, ensuring you always find your perfect tanning time.

features.title: Loyalty Reward Points
features.description: Earn points for every visit, redeemable for free sessions or premium products.

props.description: Unlock premium tanning experiences and exclusive perks with our membership.

props.title: Testimonials
props.description: Hear from our clients about their Membership experiences.

testimonials.name: Ameya Campbell
testimonials.review:
Great experience from start to finish.
Good hours, clean environment, rooms/beds are attended to immediately after use. The staff is knowledgeable and clear in explaining how the equipment and products are used. There are also great membership incentives.
Thanks Ohana :)

testimonials.name: Courtney Roberts
testimonials.review: I canceled my membership and need to be refunded. If I canceled at the beginning of August there is no reason, other than your greed, to charge me through the end of September. Horrible doing business with you.

testimonials.name: Melissa Grossman
testimonials.review: I needed a tanning salon for my wedding. I‚Äôve grown up in this neighborhood and decided to try this salon due to celebrity tanning not being in the area anymore. I went in KNOWING I only wanted 1 month of tanning. The girl that sold me the membership had zero information she could provide me and I specifically said I only needed one month of tanning. When I went to cancel my membership, I was told by the same person that sold me my membership that she isn‚Äôt sure why the bill cycle is adding an additional month. I asked to speak with the manager, Gail, and she happened to come in on shift while I was there tanning. Gail informed me that they require 30 days notice to cancel a membership. I advised her that I was not aware of any basics to this membership because they have employees selling memberships and providing ZERO information and how am I supposed to know when I‚Äôm the customer, not the one who works there. Then she said ‚Äúit‚Äôs in the fine print when signing up for your membership‚Äù I understand that, however, I was trusting the people they have selling memberships for their company to provide the basics of a membership because I clearly missed it. Gail said ‚Äúwell you only signed up for a month‚Äù I explained to her that I came in telling her employee I only needed to tan for one month due to my wedding and being out of the country half of April (so it would make no sense for me to need more than 1 month). Therefore, I wouldn‚Äôt be able to us the remaining of the membership anyways and had I know that I needed to give 30 day notice, I would have canceled when I started the membership. Gail proceeded to tell me ‚Äúwell we have a 1 month membership‚Äù blaming the customer.. I reminded her, I came into the salon saying I only needed 1 month of membership and her employee failed to be able to provide any information on the memberships or connect the customer with the appropriate membership and that it‚Äôs not my job to decipher they‚Äôre package menu. When I was asking questions about the membership, I was getting blank stares. I was told ‚Äúoh, well she is new‚Äù which I also understand we all have to learn, however,  Gail could have taken some accountability being the manager and accommodated in some sort of way. She continued to place blame on the customer and saying ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry, there isn‚Äôt anything I can do‚Äù No, there isn‚Äôt anything she is WILLING to do. Not even take accountability for poor customer service. Anyways, shop around. The only reason I gave 1 star is because the ambiance is stylish and there is 1 girl that works there that always greets you. The other employees, which I believe are the owners, are not friendly or welcoming.

faqs.answer: Membership offers exclusive discounts, priority booking, and access to special events. Enjoy unlimited tanning sessions, complimentary products, and personalized skincare consultations tailored to your tanning needs.
faqs.question: What are the benefits of joining Ohana Sun Tanning?

faqs.answer: Signing up is easy! Visit our salon or sign up online through our website. Choose the membership plan that fits your needs, fill out the registration form, and enjoy immediate access to all member benefits.
faqs.question: How do I sign up for a membership?

faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your membership at any time. We value your satisfaction and offer flexible cancellation policies. Simply visit our salon or contact customer service to process your cancellation.
faqs.question: Can I cancel my membership at any time?

faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer multiple membership tiers, each designed to cater to different tanning habits and preferences. Choose from basic to premium plans, with varying levels of access and benefits.
faqs.question: Are there different membership tiers available?

faqs.answer: Yes, membership benefits apply to all tanning services, including UV beds, spray tans, and tanning products. Enjoy special rates and offers on your favorite tanning methods, ensuring you get the best value.
faqs.question: Do membership benefits apply to all tanning services?

faqs.answer: If you miss an appointment, it's important to reschedule at your earliest convenience. Membership allows for easy booking changes, so you can get back to your tanning routine without losing any benefits.
faqs.question: What happens if I miss my tanning appointment?

props.title: Membership Service Frequently Asked Questions
props.description: Find answers to common membership-related queries.

props.title: Ready to Transform Your Look?
props.description: Experience the excellence of our Membership services. Book your appointment today!

contactInfo.address: 3230 East Union Hills Drive, Suite 105, Phoenix, AZ, 85050
